nlp.diff
Class Diff

java.lang.Object
  nlp.diff.Diff

public class Diff
extends java.lang.Object

Find the difference between 2 arrays using the standard dynamic programming algorithm. 

 Typical use:
 Object[] o1 = {new Character('a')};
 Object[] o2 = {new Character('b')};
 System.out.println("Diff = " + diff(o1, o2));
 printdiff(o1, o2);

Method Detail

diff

public static int diff(java.lang.Object[] a,
                       java.lang.Object[] b)
Find the number of differences between 2 arrays counting insertions, deletions, and changes.

Parameters:
a - The first array
b - The second array
Returns:
The number of changes to convert a to b

difflist

public static int[] difflist(java.lang.Object[] a,
                             java.lang.Object[] b)
Find the differences between 2 arrays counting insertions, deletions, and changes.

Parameters:
a - The first array
b - The second array
Returns:
An array of pairs of the index of the elements from a and b with -1 representing not present (delete/insert)

conv

public static java.lang.Character[] conv(java.lang.String s)
Convert a String into a Character array for debugging purposes.

Parameters:
s - The String to be converted
Returns:
An array of Characters that is equivalent to the String
